Baker Boy

Hip Hop Artist

Born in Darwin and raised in the remote Northern Territory communities of Milingimbi and Maningrida, Danzal Baker OAM aka Baker Boy is the freshest new hip-hop talent to emerge from Australia. Young, strong and proud Baker Boy raps in English and Yolngu language representing his Arnhem Land family. His list of accomplishments include 2019 Young Australian of The Year, multiple ARIA nominations, and twice Artist of the Year at the NIMAs.
